app_description: Edgeless Chat: Where walls don t have ears OVERVIEW EDGELESS is the safest place to text. We believe your data should only belong to YOU and there should be no prying eyes taking control of what you share online. Online lives are also real lives which is why we must free ourselves from data mining hacking and relying on social media companies to safeguard our privacy. There should be no greedy company government organization or any third party keeping tabs on you. BLOCKCHAIN MESSENGER Whether it s everyday texting exchanging photos with friends or exchanging private information such as bank information credit cards passwords social security numbers EDGELESS has been designed to use the revolutionary blockchain technology to get your message across. Our systems ensure that your data goes through directly to the intended recipient with no prying eyes in the way. Using this messaging app you get the ability to: 1 Delete messages both on your phone and THEIR phone 2 Use a built in social networking Memories feature 3 Share files and documents of any sizes 4 Automatically erase your history using the Burn feature 5 Use Dark Theme and also customize your interface in different colors themes 6 Utilize our blockchain technology to remain worry free 7 And much much more EDGELESS user activity is heavily encrypted. Even we can t access it let alone government organizations or marketing companies. When you delete your data using the Burn feature there will be no backups anywhere and the data will get destroyed completely. Using the same technology that makes Edgeless Chat great we are striving to free today s user from data abuse. Our mission is to change the internet and ensure that everyone is able to use it the way it was originally intended we built Edgeless Chat with the same ambition in mind. TAKE CONTROL Download Edgeless Chat NOW to take back the control.
